title: Fourth of July with the Guy Next Door
description: AlexisWe've been friends since childhood. He lives right next door to me. So when he needs my help for an Independence Day event I say yes. Playing the fake fiancee is a stretch for my acting skills. But why am I seeing him in a different light? Could my best friend really be the perfect guy?DaxIn my job you get one chance to make a good impression.So I'm willing to do what it takes to get results.But pretending Alexis is my fiancee has opened my eyes. I can't get her spectacular curves out of my head. But will we ruin our friendship by taking it further? I'm willing to risk it all to find out. ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥Welcome back to Snowflake Falls, where the holidays are fine, the scenery is spectacular and the men are hotter than ever! Each story is standalone, but keep an eye out for recurring characters and families. Steamy, sweet, upbeat insta-love short romance featuring friends to lovers plus fake fiancee shenanigans. No cheating and a guaranteed HEA to keep the home fires burning. Prepare for some fireworks! Jessa x
author: Jessa Joy
